title: Axes Endpoints
text: According to the equation, $$a=3$$ and $$b=2$$. This means that the major axes endpoints are: $$(-5,10),(-5,4)$$. The minor axes endpoints are: $$(-3,7),(-7,7)$$

title: Foci Endpoints
text: Since $$a=3$$ and $$b=2$$, we can use $$c=\sqrt{a^2-b^2}$$ to get $$c=\sqrt{5}$$. This means that the foci are (-5,7+sqrt(5)),(-5,7-sqrt(5))
